docs.lead_paragraph: Washington beat host Indiana behind 25 points from Bradley Beal and 22 from Trevor Ariza as the teams’ Eastern Conference semifinals series got underway.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Washington Wizards beat Indiana Pacers, 102-96, taking Game 1 in their Eastern Conference semifinal series; other basketball news noted.

docs.snippet: The uniforms have changed, but the Nets’ Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett have a notable history against the Miami Heat’s LeBron James in the postseason....
docs.lead_paragraph: The uniforms have changed, but the Nets’ Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett have a notable history against the Miami Heat’s LeBron James in the postseason.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets stars Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett have a notable history playing against the Miami Heat's LeBron James in the postseason, even if their current teams are not yet traditional rivals; teams are preparing to face each other in much-anticipated Eastern Conference semifinal playoff series.

docs.snippet: The whistle-blower of the University of North Carolina sees a movement brewing in college sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The whistle-blower of the University of North Carolina sees a movement brewing in college sports.
docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column commends whistle-blower Mary Willingham for her long effort to lay bare how the University of North Carolina and other schools admit student athletes who are not ready for college courses, and allow them to graduate without receiving an education; holds Willingham's work is an important part of movement to dismantle the power of the NCAA and athletic departments over how universities are managed.
